H0.text: Radio wave emissions suggested the presence of a planet outside of our solar system, which has been detected.

H1.text: A wobble in the rotation of the star suggested the presence of a planet outside of our solar system.

H2.text: Regular occurring eclipses of its moons suggested the presence of a planet outside of our solar system.

H3.text: The discovery of a star as large as our own suggested the presence of a planet outside of our solar system, following the detection of planets beyond our solar system.

A4.text: A star with a planet will move in its own small orbit in response to the planet's gravity.
